thread.title_full: Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2017 – Superintendent, Counsellor & Other Posts

author: publisher12
title: Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2017 – Superintendent, Counsellor & Other Posts

organizations.name: chandigarh child & women development corporation ltd

text: Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2017 – Superintendent, Counsellor & Other Posts Chandigarh Child & Women Development Corporation Ltd Jobs 2017 – Superintendent, Counsellor & Other Posts: Child & Women Development Corporation Limited, Chandigarh has issued a notification for the recruitment of Clinical Psychologist, Superintendent, Counsellor & Other vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 23-02-2017 up to 02.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Chandigarh Child & Women Development Corporation Ltd Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 06 1. Clinical Psychologist: 01 Post 2. Superintendent (Resident Manager): 01 Post 3. Assistant Superintendent (Assistant Resident Manager): 01 Post 4. Office Incharge (Warden): 01 Post 5. Counsellor: 01 Post 6. Helpline Manager: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be minimum 35 years for Post 1, between 25-60 years for Post 2 to 4, between 25-45 years for Post 5 & between 25-50 years for Post 6. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master’s degree in psychology with experimental psychology as one of the subject with a diploma in Medical (clinical) psychology from a recognized institution/ university or Ph.D degree in Clinical Psychology from a recognized university for Post 1, Masters (Preferably in Sociology, Psychology, Social Work, Anthropology, Accounts, Economics, Business Management) for Post 2, Graduation (Preferably in Sociology, Psychology) for Post 3 & for more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their resume with one passport size photograph, contact no. and self- attested copies of all relevant testimonials to Managing Director, Chandigarh Child & Women Dev. Corp. Ltd., Additional Town Hall Building, 3rd Floor, Sector 17-c, Chandigarh on or before 23-02-2017 up to 02.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 23-02-2017 up to 02.00 PM. For more details like salary, qualification, vacancy details & other information click on the link given below….
